column4: i'm trying to watch a dvd using totem or vlc and they both say that the source is unreadable
i know the dvd works, and one time, it worked in totem
try installing libdvdcss2
wha is libdvdcss2?
allows for dvd decryption
yes
you're welcome
apt-get said it had no candidate
System > Administration > Software Sources and enable multiverse
danke
np
thats new to me then, have you tried playing it with vlc? it has libdvdcss built-in
i was worried abuot that, thanks for your help
yeah actually, it just closes itself. when i opened it using terminal, it said that "there was nothing to play"
have you tried other another DVD?
yes, they all fail but when i tried one about a half an hour ago,it worked fine.
i can browse the dvd but not play it
do other CDs play normally?
i don't have anny around to test
i'm guessing, if one dvd worked before and now it doesnt, its either a faulty drive or a dusty one. other than that, i'm not sure.
np
